# currentSnapshot

**Instance Property**

An immutable representation of the timeline state at time of request.

## Declaration

```swift
var currentSnapshot: AVPlayerItemIntegratedTimelineSnapshot { get }
```

## Discussion

A timeline snapshot provides a read-only view of the details of the timeline. Because a snapshot provides a fixed view of the timeline at the time of the request, its state doesn’t update as playback continues.

## Inspecting snapshots

- **AVPlayerItemIntegratedTimelineSnapshot**: An immutable representation of inspectable details of an integrated timeline object.
- **snapshotsOutOfSyncNotification**: A notification the system posts when the snapshot objects provided by this timeline become out of sync with the current timeline state.
